cisc275.group3.model.scene

Class Scene

  • java.lang.Object
    • cisc275.group3.model.scene.Scene
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public abstract class Scene
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Simplest base class of a scene supporting methods shared by all subclasses. Additional, unique functionality should be implemented by subclasses, and shared functionality by interfaces.

    Scene.java

    Author:
    Scott, Jon, Ryan, Jolyne
    See Also:

      • processClick

        public boolean processClick(double clickX,
                   double clickY,
                   java.lang.String cursorName)
        Process Click Events from Controller. If a scene object is clicked on, its name is printed to console. This is probably a good place to check "click compatibility".
        Parameters:
        clickX - double-x-axis coordinate of click
        clickY - double-y-axis coordinate of click
        Returns:
        boolean is click on clickable object?

      • toString

        Represents Scene as a String by printing its parameters.
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
        Returns:
        multiline string of parameter states
